title: These 11 hotel chains have name-brand coffee in guest rooms
text: BING NEWS: Providence Hotel Joins Wyndham Hotels and Resorts Brand Guest rooms at Wyndham Garden Providence feature 37-inch flat screen televisions, coffee makers, spacious work desks and ... which can be redeemed for complimentary hotel stays, airline tickets, name-brand merchandise and dining and shopping gift cards ... 07/6/2015 - 1:00 pm | View Link Days Inn Hotel Brand Launches Industry-Leading Health and Fitness Initiative Dayfit: an industry- leading initiative designed to target health-conscious travelers by offering enhanced fitness facilities and healthier breakfast options at hotels nationwide. Days Inn®—one the world’s largest hotel chains and a part of Wyndham ... 09/11/2013 - 5:08 am | View Link Champaign council to consider rebate for proposed hotel A parking garage would comprise the next three floors — about one parking space per guest room — and 145 hotel rooms would ... with a "high quality hotel" and will announce a name brand on or before Tuesday's city council meeting. 04/30/2012 - 5:51 am | View Link What is the difference between Food and Beverage Management & Hotel and Restaurant Management ? F/B = fast food chains ,coffee shops and other chain types dealing with food service of in and out menus.
